Return the value of the fuzz factor used in numeric expressions.

Source: R/config.R
config_epsilon.Rd

Return the value of the fuzz factor used in numeric expressions.

Usage

config_epsilon()

Value

A float.

Examples

config_epsilon()

## [1] 1e-07

See also

  • https://keras.io/api/utils/config_utils#epsilon-function
